backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing applications, user profiles, access control, Stripe config, and a publish/unpublish site state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of a specific FAQ item and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and recent updates.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for project-level CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, SEO tags, and mounting the React application.
frontend/IONOS_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining how to configure a custom IONOS domain to point to the deployed Internet Computer canister.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with the SitePublishGate.
frontend/src/components/HomeFaqPreview.t: Home page FAQ preview card displaying a small accordion with key competition questions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout component providing header, footer, and outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with competition info, navigation links, mission statement, and branding credit.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive navigation header showing branding and active-state links for Home, Apply, and FAQs.
Gates rendering based on site publish status, showing loading, error, offline, or children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Provides a mutation to create a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, logging in/out, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains queries and mutations for Stripe config check and submitting finalized applications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSitePublished.ts: Checks whether the site is published using the backend actor with retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, fonts, and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ApplyPage.tsx: Displays a card with a link to an external application form for applicants.
frontend/src/pages/FaqsPage.tsx: Renders FAQ sections using accordion components for competition-related questions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, timeline, call‑to‑action, and feature highlights for the music competition.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message, explains no charges occurred, and offers navigation to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe session status, finalizes an application draft, and shows success or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/SiteOfflinePage.tsx: Simple maintenance page indicating the site is temporarily offline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, fonts, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking state, issues, and feature requests including custom domain setup and FAQ removal.
